content:
Smiling David's Dance School

Brings the Best of Latin Dance to the Poconos come with us and Escape to the Poconos

See Salsa, Bachata and other Latin dance performed by some of the Best Dancers in the Northeast. Learn Latin dances or improve your technique at one of the many workshops

Dance with the performers at the nightly Socials. Then relax at a picnic with the premiere dance instructors in the Region. Take full advantage of all the attractions offered at Split Rock

Make Your Reservations Now!!!!
"Come and Escape With Us."

Save The Date: April 22 - 24, 2016
